name: Tunnel of Love: I'm Diggin' It
name_original: Tunnel of Love: I'm Diggin' It
description:
So you've been talking to this mole over text for a while now, and you're ready to take the next step...the only problem is she's on the other side of the world! Good thing evolution has optimized you for digging, because it's time to burrow on down and meet her halfway. During your journey, collect gifts to make this first rendezvous special. You'll want to do everything to impress this very real mole at the hottest date spot on Earth!

Tunnel of Love is a drag-and-drop maze puzzle game with a gripping romance story. We hope you enjoy playing!
